item.description:
Hello Salsa Fans:  

Join me for a fun night of salsa dancing and to watch a special showcase performance by the Masacote Salsa Retreat participants from all over the world.  I personally attended the first retreat and had a blast; it will be awesome to see what was learned at the retreat this year.  Let's meet-up at 6:30pm so that everyone can get to know each other before the classes begin.      

  

The 4th Annual MASACOTE SALSA RETREAT

**** GRAND FINALE CELEBRATION ****

 andSpecial Club Cubanos Edition

With Special Showcase Presentation! 

 August 25th, 2012 in Boston!

 
What is it?! Masacote has an Annual Retreat in Maine every August where people come from around the world to train for an intensive week with Ana & Joel Masacote. The final day, ALL PARTICIPANTS return to Boston to Party with the dancers of the Boston Salsa Community.
Get Ready!!! People from as far as London, Germany, China, Czech Republic, Bermuda, Japan, Malaysia, Philippines, and throughout Canada and the US will be returning to Boston Saturday, Aug 25, 2012 for a Grand Finale celebration of an incredible week. Everyone from the Boston Salsa Community is invited!

 

 

EVEN BETTER!!!  During the party, all participants of the advanced sectional will be performing to a work from Masacote Dance Company, choreographed by Ana & Joel Masacote. This year's choreography will be the Masacote signature work, "Mambo Gallego". You won't want to miss it!

 

And for the best treat yet, photographer extraordinaire Valentin Behringer will be on site capturing the beauty of the Boston salsa scene!

  

Event Details:

Date:  Saturday, August 25, 2012

Location: Holiday Inn Brookline; 1200 Beacon St; Brookline, MA 02446
 

Special Workshops with Masacote:  7:00-9:15pm (Read Schedule below); 

Cover:$10 for 1, or 3 for $20!  FREE Casino Rueda Lesson for All Levels with Kristina Masson: 9:15-10:00pm

Party & Dancing: 10:00pm - 2:00am with DJ Rob Suave

Showtime: 11:00pm  Cover: $15 in advance; $20 @ door (Cover includes Casino Rueda Lesson for All Levels)

**  Dress: Smart Casual

  • This is An All Ages event
  • Cash bar
  • Complimentary Appetizers
  • Complimentary Casino Rueda Lesson for All Levels
  • Parking available at hotel for discounted fee.
  • Hotel right across the street from Green line T stop.

  

Special Workshops & Lessons  Workshop Schedule:  (Only $10/workshop, or 3 for $20!)

 7-7:45pm: Ladies' Styling with Ana Masacote (All Levels)

7:45-8:30pm: Guaguanco & Body Movement with Aaron Damus (All Levels)

8:30-9:15pm: Afro Cuban Movement with Joel Masacote (All Levels)

Free Casino Rueda Lesson with Kristina Masson:  (Complimentary with Cover)

9-10pm: "Casino Rueda for All Levels" (Description below)

Casino Rueda (or Rueda de Casino) is a very popular type of round dancing of Salsa. All are welcome, from the absolute novice to the advanced dancer. Developed in Havana, Cuba in the late 1950s & early 1960s, Casino Rueda consists of pairs of dancers forming a circle, and swapping partners around the circle through dance moves called out by one person, a caller.

Learn in a comfortable, relaxed and FUN setting!  

 

See you there!

  

-Angel

 

TO BUY TICKETS ONLINE VISIT:  

http://www.masacoteretreat.com/finale.html
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a black fedora hat.
